document.full_text: israel's mirs communications has chosen nokia siemens networks to supply the infrastructure for its new mobile phone network in a deal valued at 200 million shekels ($59 million) over three years.
document.title: israel's mirs picks nokia siemens for mobile deal
lines_and_colors: israel's mirs communications has chosen nokia siemens networks to supply the infrastructure for its new mobile phone network in a deal valued at 200 million shekels ($59 million) over three years.
